welcome_message_body: Welcome to Etimesgut, where traditional Turkish charm meets modern convenience. Known for its vibrant markets, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Etimesgut Airport handles both domestic and international flights.
